name: <console::Stdout as core::fmt::Write>::write_str

core::str::<impl str>::as_bytes.doc:
Converts a string slice to a byte slice. To convert the byte slice back
 into a string slice, use the [`from_utf8`] function.

 # Examples

 ```
 let bytes = "bors".as_bytes();
 assert_eq!(b"bors", bytes);
 ```

arch::serial::send.doc: Sends a byte on the serial port.

core::option::Option: Unknown([Downcast(VariantIdx(1, ThreadLocalIndex)), Field(0, Ty { id: 1394, kind: RigidTy(Ref(Region { kind: ReErased }, Ty { id: 1, kind: RigidTy(Uint(U8)) }, Not)) })])
